page.title: 02Our House.
page.content: Our house is made of stone and has a slate roof. We have four bedrooms and two bathrooms upstairs and another bedroom, a lounge, toilet, living room and kitchen downstairs. We have a colour television and a portable television that we use with the computer. We have not got a video yet. In the kitchen we have a fridge, electic cooker, washing machine and the boiler for the central heating. Our heating works by coal because there is no gas in the village. The deep freeze is in the workshop, we have two garages and a bike shed. The garden is nice and big to play in. We can ride our bikes all round the house. Up by the apple trees is the caravan that we are going to take on holiday. If the whole family goes we will take a tent too. The room we use most is the living room.
